thread.title: Unhappy Soccer Fans No Good for Gambling Group

author: Paul J. Davies
title: Unhappy Soccer Fans No Good for Gambling Group
text: Fans of English soccer club Arsenal aren’t the only ones pleased with the pending retirement of 22-year head coach, Arsène Wenger: at least one bookmaker will be relieved, too. A run of poor results for the team since last November bought calls from all around the world for Mr. Wenger to step down. Losses by Arsenal Brexit & Beyond: Eurozone Economy Stumbles in First Quarter Next AllianceBernstein's Highway Men To Live Large in Nashville
